Gnomes/Dwarves Players get the following flightpoints in order Loch Modan, Ironforge, Wetlands and Auberdine.
Nightelve Players get the following flightpoints in order Darnassus and Auberdine.

Nightelves: Train at Level 12 in Darnassus.

waypoints.header: Arrive ALL at LVL 12 in Auberdine

The other players should coordinate and try to obtain the 5 Bronze Tubes from Wetland (2 Locs), Thelsamar, Ironforge and Dun Morogh. A short roundtrip Stormwind-Ironforge via Deeprun for the Bronzetube might be a good idea as well.

special: Fly to Lakeshire and turn in Quest.

Then Obtain Yellow Punchard outside the instance.
Grind outside till all are at least Level 29.
After turning in all Gnomereganquests all should be 30.
No Jumprun, you need to obtain collectables for all within ONE run.
Punch Card order: Yellow -> Blue (Clean Room) -> Red (Electrocutioner 6000) -> Prismatic (Pummeler)

Do Raptors or Cursed Crew till the Warriors are back
44,93 Arathi Highlands map . Jump from the bridge into the water, and find the letter in the sand, near a dead body. Right click on the letter, accept the quest
Head to Scarlet Monastery. Avoid Andorhal!
Graveyard till all are Level 33 (Endboss might be skipped)
Library till all are Level 36 (All get the key)

special: Guide for last steps of Onyxia Questchain.

Fly to Morgan's Vigil in Burning Steppes
Kill Emperor, but let princess alive!
Fly to Morgan's Vigil in Burning Steppes
Do Bael'gar area till all hit Level 53. Drops 2-Hand Weapon Upgrade

DECISION: At Level 53, it is possible to grind towards General Angerforge and the coffers, but Angerforge is pretty hard. Prison mobs will have fallen off an experience and anger Forge is a high-value target, because he has an immense axe damage upgrade for the Warriors. You should also consider targeting gear more than experience per hour now, as many items dropping in BRD are best in slot. I recommend not going for general anger Forge though until the group has grinded towards vale guard and the conference to level 55.
At 55 you can grind very deep into BRD and continue killing up to the bar or possibly beyond depending on how your group has been geared thus far until level 57.
1. Do BRD Jump Runs, but Exp ist not that great.
2. Get LBRS Quests and continue Leveling there. Obtain UBRS-Key.
3. Cauldron Quests & Others in Western Plague Lands (unlocks Level 60-Quests with BiS-Items).
4. Farm reputation for Hydraxian water Lords
